POST.POST_BODY: I have just found out i have GD i have to see the dietition and so on, but i was wondering about other peoples experience with changing your diet, early labour, complications things like that im nervous as this is my first pregnancy and dont know what to expect!!

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY: My diet really didn't change.  I eat pretty healthy to begin with.   My biggest change was the hospital I'm at doesn't want ladies with GD to eat fruit at breakfast time.  They say to keep breakfast and snacks between 15 and 30 grams of carbs and keep lunch and dinner below 45 g of carbs.   I eat 3 meals and 3 snacks a day and unless I easy something stupid then I maintain my blood sugar pretty well.   My Baby is measuring big but that's not always a definite I've met ladies with GD that went full term abs had 6 and 7 lb babies.  You do have an increase for high blood pressure and pre eclamsia (my levels have been perfect).
I do snack  on veggies than I did before and I eat a ton more veggies at meal times (veggies ar considered "Free" foods) to help fill me up

Are u still able to enjoy a treat every now and again or do you find you have to be quite strict. Im overweight and although im 30 weeks i have lost 4kg since getting pregnant even with the extra baby weight so i have made changes just wanna do my best but im awful at really strict diets
I have GD, diet controlled. My baby measure just right, and my blood pressure as nurse said it is perfect.  I am 36 weeks,  I will be 37 weeks on Tuesday 28th :) good luck on your pregnancy

I have hard time with diet to. I love sugar. Specially candy, out all things. Personally every one different.  I can sneak a sweet snacks here and there.  But not everyone can handle it. My sugars are good I had few high ones but not two high. Hope all goes well for you. I can't wait till 12th of May  I have csection and I eat cheese cake for sure :)
I still have until 29th june so need to be able to have something sweet im hoping that my little.man will.come a bit early so excited to have him here good luck with everything x
I am 5 weeks pregnant and had sex with another partner on the 5th of April is it possible that he be the father?

I still have a treat every now and then.  My Baby shower was this weekend I had a very small piece of cake.  I keep fun size Hershey bars in the freezer anf may have one every few days.   Yesterday we had a party at work I had a slice of pizza and a huge salad and my numbers were perfect.   Later I had a very small piece of cake.   I work at treats into the carb count for that meal/snack time.   My nightly snack is 2 Graham crackers (Like the sheet) with about 2 tbsp of peanut butter and my fasting glucose numbers are fine.   But it's going to depend on how your body reacts.  You'll have to see how your numbers react to certain foods.
